( BB: Hopefully I have everyone�s post replied to this time.)

: Rage roared in frustration as the catbot(Feline) had dodged her jaws and 
gotten away, not even noticing that she now had a dart in the side of her 
neck�where the cat had stuck it.
She was just about to go after the female cat when the charges from optic 
lasers struck her in the side with a large explosion of mech-fluid and 
wires, a massive roar exploding from her throat as she stumbled aside, 
almost falling to her side.
Rage looked towards the direction of where the shots had come from, only to 
get hit in the shoulder by two missiles from the same direction.
This wasn�t good. All she had wanted was a meal and now she was pined in, 
nowhere to go but fight her way though. And she was vastly outnumbered as 
well.
Rage roared/whined as she swung her body away from the directions the damage 
was coming from, only to swing into the direction which another bot was 
charging her at(Hurricane) but also managed to get a few of the 25 shots 
Treadshot had aimed towards her as well.
She backed up a few steps to avoid the charging bot but then was blown onto 
her side from the amo sent towards her from Treadshot.
Rage landed hard onto her side, a wave of dirt billowing up as she slid a 
few feet, giving off a surprised, pained and raged roar.
She lay there for a second before she heaved her great body once to try and 
stand, finding that she hadn�t succeeded she tried again and managed to 
right herself. Her body low and supporting her weight with her front limbs, 
looking towards her attackers.
She had to get away, and quickly�before they managed to kill her.
Rage just began to turn and head towards the forest line when she was 
suddenly hit in the right side by a crimson beam(His), but absorbing the 
impact of the blow with all of her limbs.
By now she was completely torn, mech-fluid flowing everywhere and wires 
hanging from her sides.
But now she had more of a need to get away then ever, snapping her body 
towards the forest again, and began heading towards it at a dead run.
All that was in her mind was that she had to get away, had to get away!!
She was almost there when something chilly suddenly struck her head and 
something painful hit her legs at the same time, tipping her over and snout 
first into the dirt.
Her head was frozen, and she was unable to open her mouth to give a roar of 
protest as dirt flew up and her body crashed to earth.
The only thing which stopped her body from sliding was the fact that it had 
collided into a tree, knocking the trunk of it over and crashing across her 
body, pinning it.
Rage struggled weakly under the weight of the tree, but soon her struggling 
became weak quivers and movements of her muscles.
There was no escape!:
